## Technological change is a double edged sword

<br>

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="70%"}
- It augments human productivity -> **new jobs**

- It automates away tasks -> **technological unemployment**

:::
::: {.column width="30%"}

![Joel Mokyr and the importance of upper tail knowledge for technology adoption](assets/Joel_Mokyr.png){width=40%}
:::
::: 



::: {.columns}
::: {.column}
**Paper 1**

Who benefitted from new technology (electricity) in 20th century Sweden?

`Middle-skilled workers - sourced from the local labour market`

:::
::: {.column}
**Paper 2**

Who were the skilled workers of electrification? Where did they come from?

`Upper tail knowledge - acquired higher education and moved to opportunity`

:::
:::
